title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.2 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.2 - Scope

State Regulations

The contents of this Part are identified by a letter
prefix before the number of each section: Family Fallout Shelters
AS....................................................................................................... Group Fallout Shelters
GS..................................................................... The appendix
*
to this Part
contains standards that provide acceptable methods of compliance with this

Part. However, other construction methods, materials and building equipment
which meet the performance requirements of this Part are acceptable. Footnotes
*
See Appendix
L-1. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
502.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
